sentences.sContent: He quotes some students from the University of Michigan.
sentences.sContent_eng: He quotes some students from the University of Michigan.
sentences.sCn: 他引述了几位密歇根大学学生的话。

sentences.sContent: He points out that some past offenders in Michigan have been released only to cause havoc and end up in jail again.
sentences.sContent_eng: He points out that some past offenders in Michigan have been released only to cause havoc and end up in jail again.
sentences.sCn: 他指出，过去密歇根释放的一些犯人只是与造成严重破坏的人有关，而且最后又都重新回到监狱里。

sentences.sContent: She grew up in a wealthy suburb of Detroit in Michigan and did well at school.
sentences.sContent_eng: She grew up in a wealthy suburb of Detroit in Michigan and did well at school.
sentences.sCn: 她在密歇根底特律一个富裕的郊区长大，在学校表现也很好。
